column5: So I am able to come up to Simcoe for The Fishing For Tyler Event. I need to know the best spot to take my 5 year old out on the ice.  I am a little paranoid when I take him on the ice, this year multiply that by 1000   So I need to know where the best spot is and I don't really care how good the fishing is (But it would be nice to ice a perch this winter)  Any help is appreciated.
Still plenty of spots for perch with good ice, Dan.  The "Simcoe boys" on the board will point you in the right direction.  We will be over at Port Bolster area.

Hey Dan I was in Pefferlaw on Sunday and Keswick on Monday both are sitting around 15 inches of ice...We drove a minivan out on both.  Bite was slow both places, but the weather was beautiful so we made the most of it!
Didn't drill less than 18" out of port bolster Saturday, we were in 26-30 fow
For the record a truck did go through in Sutton on Monday.  But there were plenty of guys driving out where we were.

LOOK UP THE INTERSECTION SPOONERS AND MAPLE IN LEFROY, YOU CAN WALK OUT THERE. I WAS OFF THERE ON SUN ABOUT 1 MILE OUT IN 30 FT OF WATER AND CAUGHT AT LEAST 100 PERCH...ONLY KEPT 4 BUT HAD SOME FUN....NICE DAY. LEFROY IS JUST A BIT SOUTH OF INNISVILLE BEACH. I WAS ON ABOUT 8 IN'S OF GOOD ICE SO IT'S NOT TOO NERV RACKING...ENJOY
I am feeling a bit daring, can anyone point me in the direction of about 1.5 inches of ice?

Dan  Outfitters are out of GILFORD, KONTIKI   I was there 3 days ago  by the green huts  500+ people on the ice  drilled 20 or so holes nothing less than 8-10 inches of solid ice.  Plenty of ice to walk or atv ON....  See ya saturday  Dave
Perfect, thanks guys.  My boy is excited
Hey Dan where are you heading out of saturday? I'll be there with my 5 year old as well.  Let me know maybe we can head out together onto the ice.
Not sure, let me know what time you will get there and we can head out. I'll PM you my cell

I am going out with a group with tim hales this weekend. Hopefully he can put me on some perch as this may be the only ice fishing trip i get to go on this winter. Been so busy, and the lack of good ice has been sad.
I'd say the east side has the best ice, and best fishing right now. Drilled thru 16" today, and got some nice perch
